--- product_code: ls11 description: 10mm German Mörsers auf Rädern (Wheeled Mortars) title: 10mm German Mörsers auf Rädern (Wheeled Mortars) breadcrumb: Mörsers auf Rädern (Wheeled Mortars) name: German Mörsers auf Rädern (Wheeled Mortars) cost: $12.00 paypal_id: UNEDZFS82WV32 ---

Mortars were used in sieges, firing out of sappe (pits) for protection where they lobbed shells up and over fortress walls.

This is a Mörsers auf Rädern (Wheeled Mortars) unit of two wheeled mortars and six crew. You will recieve two mortar barrels (ls_d), two mortar chassis (ls11a), four reinforced spoked wheels (ls_a) and five crew (one ls_e and mix of four ls15a–i).
